title: New Designer Interior Paint Colors, Updated Lavish Landscaping, Cable
posting_body: Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.
Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.
Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.
You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.
Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.
-Newly Renovated Kitchens With Quartz Countertops, New Cabinets, and Stainless Steel Appliances
-Renovated and Expanded Clubhouse With a Refreshed Fitness Center
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
